Articles.Content:
The polar bear is a plane with three atmospheric engines, two ram air intakes and some other junk, this is the first successful aircraft made by polar bear AB. And all of our products are polar bear friendly (almost).

(The video has been removed since the kerbal involved did not like the embarrasment brought upon him via this video, Pictures will be arriving soon)

WARNING: Products are highly explosive! And we do not take any responsibility for the deaths or injuries caused by our products.

Edited August 27, 2012 by Polar Bear
